original_title: Hermie & Friends:  Hermie and The High Seas
overview: Good thing God never says anything unusual to Hermie. Uh-ohâ€¦ suddenly there's room for doubt. What possible need would the Garden Gang have for a boat? It hasn't rained in ages. Isn't it good enough to believe God once-why do we have to keep on trusting Him time after time? Hermie and the High Seas teaches the lesson based on Jesus' words from the mountain-side in Matthew 6 about relying on God to care for our every need.
tagline: If Hermie is good at anything, it's believing what God says.
title: Hermie & Friends:  Hermie and The High Seas
